item.title: Hello HUGO Gokarna world !
item.description: Welcome to my new website where I will be sharing my thoughts on bioinformatics, data science, and other topics that interest me. I hope you will find it enjoyable! Creating a website with Hugo and Gokarna theme To kick things off, I thought I’d share how I built this website using (Hugo)[https://gohugo.io/] and (Gokarna)[https://gokarna-hugo.netlify.app/] theme. It all started when I stumbled upon a GitHub page with the Gokarna theme, and was immediately drawn to its simplicity and beauty.
